citation.case_name: Baltimore City Lodge Number 3, Fraternal Order of Police v. Mayor and City Council of Baltimore, Maryland

html:
510 U.S. 1141

Baltimore City Lodge Number 3, Fraternal Order of Police
v.
Mayor and City Council of Baltimore, Maryland, et al.

No. 93-1173.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 22, 1994.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 4th Cir.

2

Motion of Fraternal Order of Police, Grand Lodge, for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae in No. 93-1173 granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 6 F. 3d 1012.
